title: Rentier state listens to for. corps. not citizens

content.question: In a rentier system, public policy is less responsive to citizens because of which of the following factors?

choices.label: Most citizens rent rather than own property.
Government revenues are derived from foreign purchases of a particular resource.
Governments are necessarily corrupt in such systems.
There is no consensus for policy because the polity is fractured by numerous cleavages.
Such systems have temporary governments, which do not have time to develop policy.

content.answer: Government revenues are derived from foreign purchases of a particular resource.
